author: Gareth Beavis
title: How to watch Joe Wicks' PE workout right now
description: We’re spending time bouncing around with an incredibly fit man - here’s how you can join Joe Wicks’ plans too
content:
It's the week once more, and millions of people around the globe are staying fit with one man: Joe Wicks, PE teacher for the UK (and, increasingly, the world).
This incredibly energetic man is keeping us all sweating at 9AM BST every week day, and all with a… [+5691 chars]
